name: 马修·方丹·莫里
bio_short: 美国海军军官、天文学家和海洋学家，被誉为“海洋探路者”和“现代海洋学之父”。他通过“数据挖掘”旧的船长日志，绘制了第一张全球“风与洋流图”。
bio_short_en: An American naval officer, astronomer, and oceanographer, known as the 'Pathfinder of the Seas' and a 'father of modern oceanography'. He 'data-mined' old ship's logs to create the first global charts of winds and ocean currents.
